name: Crycto
description:
CRYCTO

Bored of news that claims that cryptocoins are the best way to solve your problems? Don't worry, you can get in the cryptocoins world playing this videogame that satirizes cryptocoins.

⚫In Crycto you will found a clicker and idle game were you define your run based on the items you bought.  

🔵If you don't want to just clickclickclick, Crycto implements a semi-alternative  way to play that will reward you based on your point and click skills.

 🟣You can take different paths to make your game run unique untill run out the cryptocoin you are mining. The game runs are based in what items you buy the most and if you play mostly afk or clicking. 

👾Now in pre-alpha, there are a lot of work to do and implement a few mechanics that enhances the diferent game runs you can take.
